subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Vilma, a team captain, was suspended without pay for the coming season; Cleveland’s Scott Fujita, Green Bay’s Anthony Hargrove, and New Orleans’s Will Smith received lesser penalties.
snippet: Jonathan Vilma, a team captain, was suspended without pay for the coming season; Cleveland’s Scott Fujita, Green Bay’s Anthony Hargrove, and New Orleans’s Will Smith received lesser penalties.
